entry.title: Nissan - Pathfinder
entry.content: Hybrid System The 2.5-liter 4-cylinder engine is superchargedâ€”meaning that there’s 250 hp generated by Pathfinder’s Hybrid system. The 15 kW power-regenerating electric motor is powered by lithium-ion cells, and the Intelligent Dual Clutch System efficiently manages power from both the electric motor and the engine. To save power, the gas engine only kicks in when it needs to, and switches to the electric motor to conserve fuel when you start-up, coast, or stop.

entry.title: Panera - You've got the power
entry.content: Start your day with a mouthful of whole grain, all-natural egg, lean ham and tangy Vermont white cheddar, for real get up and go.

entry.title: Bank of America - Homeowners
entry.content: If you’re a homeowner struggling with your loan payments, you may want to learn about our home loan assistance programs. Bank of America is committed to helping homeowners and is a participant in the national mortgage settlement agreement.
